original: Leonardo DiCaprio's speech on climate change at the UN General Assembly is a powerful example of utilizing emotional appeal to deliver a persuasive argument. As one of Hollywood's most influential actors and environmental activists, DiCaprio skillfully employs various rhetorical devices and personal anecdotes to engage the audience's emotions and drive home the urgency of the climate crisis. By ev
